ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hunting 46-50
ygData.msgSnippet: There is also an entrance to JP through Black Burrow... so all the evils can get in and kill the animals... muah ha ha... ... ===== ~~~~~~~~~ And on the eighth
ygData.messageBody:
There is also an entrance to JP through Black
Burrow... so all the evils can get in and kill the
animals... muah ha ha...

:)
--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
>
> I think Jaggedpine is actually attached to surefall
> glade. so if you are kos

> graphics. I hear there are
> some cool things that drop there though. Eye of the
> Griffon drops there.
> It's +10 wisdom but -20 charisma, range slot item.
> luv,
> -Su

> try jagged pine......its between blackburrow and
